<h1 align="center">
  Deploy Gatsby.js to Firebase Hosting guide source code
</h1>

This is a source code for a guide on how to deploy Gatsby.js website to Firebase Hosting published at [https://ryndia.me/deploy-gatsby-js-website-to-firebase-hosting](https://ryndia.me/deploy-gatsby-js-website-to-firebase-hosting).

This repository includes:

1. Unmodified official Gatsby.js starter template [https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby-starter-default](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby-starter-default)
2. My firebase project config
3. GitHub Action workflows to build and deploy website to Firebase Hosting to
   - **live** channel (on `push` or `merge` to `main` branch), or to
   - **preview** channel (on PR to `main` branch).

## :bell: Attention

Remember to update workflow files in [/.github/workflows](/.github/workflows) with your variables.
